content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Welcome to TGP!</>
content.text:
Welcome to TGP — An Australian Ark Community

Thanks for joining us. TGP is a growing Ark community that focuses on fair play, long-term progression, and an environment where players can enjoy PvP without constant wipe threats. We’re not here to stomp out new survivors — we want you to have the time and space to build, grow, and eventually take on the bigger tribes.

Whether you’re playing solo or as part of a group, you’ll find plenty of support, competition, and opportunities to make your mark.

What You’ll Find Here:

• <TextStyle.Green>Server Info</> – Settings, rates, mods, and stat changes
• <TextStyle.Red>Rules</> – Know what’s allowed (and what isn’t)
• <TextStyle.LightBlue>Drops</> – Details on custom loot and crates
• <TextStyle.Orange>Tips</> – Useful tricks and community advice

Take a few moments to read through the tabs — knowing the details will help you get the most out of your time here.

Need Help?

Our admin team is active and here to help. If you’re ever stuck, confused, or run into issues, reach out on <TextStyle.Blue>Discord</> and we’ll get you sorted.

Join the community: https://discord.gg/tgpasa

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>General Settings</>
content.text:
Core cluster configurations and tribe limitations:

<TextStyle.Green>Base Rates:</>
<TextStyle.White>Harvest:</> 5x
<TextStyle.White>Taming:</> 10x
<TextStyle.White>XP:</> 2.5x
<TextStyle.White>Stack Size:</> 10x
<TextStyle.White>Custom Caves:</> Enabled

<TextStyle.Green>ORP (Offline Raid Protection):</>
<TextStyle.White>Turret Damage:</> 2x
<TextStyle.White>Structure Resistance:</> 2x
<TextStyle.White>Eligibility:</> only via discord application

<TextStyle.Green>Turrets:</>
<TextStyle.White>Turret Limit:</> 100
<TextStyle.White>Turret Damage:</> 1x

<TextStyle.Green>Transfers:</>
<TextStyle.White>Tribute Transfers:</> Enabled
<TextStyle.White>Element Transfers:</> Enabled

<TextStyle.Green>Dinos:</>
<TextStyle.White>Saddle Cap:</> Official
<TextStyle.White>Tribe Dino Limit:</> 250
<TextStyle.White>Tamed Food Drain:</> 0.75%
<TextStyle.White>Wild Dino Wipes:</> Daily at 3AM & 3PM AEST

<TextStyle.Green>Players:</>
<TextStyle.White>Equipment Cap:</> Official
<TextStyle.White>Tribe Size:</> 4
<TextStyle.White>Allies:</> Disabled
<TextStyle.White>Food & Water Drain:</> 0.50%

<TextStyle.Green>Cryopods & Cryo Guns:</>
<TextStyle.White>Range:</> 3 Foundations
<TextStyle.White>Cooldown/Sickness:</> Official
<TextStyle.White>Cryofridge Requirements:</> Disabled
<TextStyle.White>Cryo Capture Disabled:</> 15s after dealing/receiving damage

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>Stat & Balance Changes</>
content.text:
Below are the adjusted stats for players and dinos. If a stat isn’t listed, it remains at official values.

<TextStyle.Green>Players (Per Level):</>
<TextStyle.White>Health:</> +10
<TextStyle.White>Stamina:</> +20
<TextStyle.White>Oxygen:</> +100
<TextStyle.White>Food:</> +25
<TextStyle.White>Water:</> +25
<TextStyle.White>Weight:</> +250
<TextStyle.White>Melee:</> +7.5%
<TextStyle.White>Fortitude:</> +10
<TextStyle.White>Crafting:</> +15%

<TextStyle.Green>Dinos (Per Level):</>
<TextStyle.White>Health:</> +6.75%
<TextStyle.White>Weight:</> +100%
<TextStyle.White>Stamina:</> 2x Base Wild + Official per level

<TextStyle.Green>Creature-Specific Balancing:</>

<TextStyle.White>• Arthropluera (Tamed):</> 1.5x Damage
<TextStyle.White>• Ceratosaurus (Wild):</> 0.25x Damage
<TextStyle.White>• Pegomastax (Wild):</> 0.1x Resistance
<TextStyle.White>• Vultures (Wild):</> 0.5x Damage, 0.75x Resistance
<TextStyle.White>• Ichthyornis:</> Disabled

<TextStyle.Green>Spawn Adjustments:</>
<TextStyle.White>• Giga & Carcha:</> Now spawn in the Scorched Earth desert

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>Breeding & Raising</>
content.text:
Key settings for breeding, raising, and imprinting your dinos.

<TextStyle.Green>General Settings:</>
<TextStyle.White>Maturation:</> 22x
<TextStyle.White>Incubation:</> 12x
<TextStyle.White>Mating Interval:</> 32m 24s – 86m 24s

<TextStyle.Green>Baby Settings:</>
<TextStyle.White>Anyone Can Cuddle:</> Enabled
<TextStyle.White>Food Consumption:</> 50% Reduced
<TextStyle.White>Imprint Timer:</> Every 24 minutes (1–2 imprints required)

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>General Rules</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 1</> - <TextStyle.White>Evidence/Proof or GTFO</>
- Have screenshots or clips ready before submitting a ticket. No proof = no action.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 2</> - <TextStyle.White>Bullying / Racism</>
- Banter is okay. Targeted abuse, racism, or hate speech isn’t. Punishment severity may vary.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 3</> - <TextStyle.White>Name Restrictions</>
- Players with names like "Admin" "Human", barcodes or "123" may be renamed at Admins discretion.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 4</> - <TextStyle.White>No Impersonating Staff</>
- Instant and permanent ban from TGP.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 5</> - <TextStyle.White>No Unapproved Advertising</>
- Promoting outside servers or Discords? Ask via ticket first — or get banned.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 6</> - <TextStyle.White>No Dossing & Doxxing</>
- Sharing personal info or attacking servers = instant permanent ban.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 7</> - <TextStyle.White>Don’t Interfere with Admins</>
- If you’re asked to move, stop, or leave — do so.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 8</> - <TextStyle.White>Causing Intentional Server Lagging / Crashing</>
- Intentionally lagging or crashing the server — whether by spam, dino abuse (Stacking), or exploits

<TextStyle.Red>Punishments:</>
<TextStyle.White>1st Offence: Warning & Tribe logged</>
<TextStyle.White>2nd Offence: 1-week ban</>
<TextStyle.White>3rd Offence: Season ban</>
Admin discretion applies.

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>PVP/Raid Rules</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 1</> - <TextStyle.White>No Mesh Biting</>
- Attacking through the mesh excessively or without fair reasoning (Clearing Meshed Structures) = your Dino is handed to your enemy
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 2</> - <TextStyle.White>Caging & Handcuffs</>
- Caging during Raiding is allowed up to 1 hour. No extended torture. Handcuffs fall under the same limit. Timer Starts after a ticket is made/staff are notified and not before. Random PvP Open world Caging is not allowed
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 3</> - <TextStyle.White>Box Platforms & Tunnel Builds</>
- You may only box the rider of a dino. Builds may cover the top and one vertical side of the creature only.
Building on multiple sides, or using structures to tunnel and bypass turrets or spam, is strictly prohibited and will result in penalties at admin discretion.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 4</> - <TextStyle.White>No Cheats, Hacks, Meshing or Exploits</>
- This includes but is not limited to building in the mesh and or traversing through it. Permanent ban, no appeal.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 5</> - <TextStyle.White>No Griefing or Bullying</>
- Includes: harassing players/tribes repeatedly, not letting players rebuild, bullying new players.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 6</> - <TextStyle.White> No Tame Sniping</>
- You cannot kill dinos left at base unless you're defending, raiding or fobbed up. This does not apply to dinos recently used/actively in use by a player
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 7</> - <TextStyle.White>Counter Raiding</>
- If you fob up to counter a raid, you must follow through. No half-hearted counters.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 8</> - <TextStyle.White> Raid Interference</>
Do not interfere with another tribes raid or defence. This will be seen as teaming. If you do not intend to fob up and fight both parties equally then leave.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 9</> - <TextStyle.White>No Popcorning / Despawning</>
- Intentionally trashing loot is illegal. Take what you can or leave it. This applies to both the base owner and the tribe raiding
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 10</> - <TextStyle.White>No Moonpool Soaker Traps</>
- Placing moonpools over water soakers during a raid to kill them is banned. Existing pre-placed moonpools are fine.

<TextStyle.Red>PSA</> - <TextStyle.White>Ascension Boss Fights</>
- Place element on dinos after completing ascension bosses to prevent loss.

<TextStyle.Red>Punishments:</>
<TextStyle.White>At the Admins discretion.</>

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>Building Rules</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 1</> - <TextStyle.White>No Building in Banned Location</>
- Player Spawns, Abb Surface Entrances, Major Resource Spawns, or in/near mesh. Red-gunned without warning.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 2</> - <TextStyle.White>No Meshing</>
- No Bases/Turrets in the mesh = season ban minimum
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 3</> - <TextStyle.White>Teleporters</>
- Small teleporters and or Transmitters near resource zones are okay with ≤10 turrets. Must not block the area or access to the area itself.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 4</> - <TextStyle.White>Spam Limits</>
- All spam must remain within 20 foundations of your furthest turret tower.
- A maximum of 10 cliff platforms may be used as spam.
- Carpet spam is only allowed between the entrance of your base/cave and your closest turret tower — not beyond.
- Clean up your spam after use, especially following raids or PvP engagements.
- NO Tek Bunker Spam!
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 5</> - <TextStyle.White>No "Tunnel" Building</>
- Do not abuse foundation support or ‘tunnel’ into someone’s base using structures or other methods to bypass and/or LOS turrets.
using structures as ramps during a raid, helping to get closer and soak is legal
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 6</> - <TextStyle.White> Illegal Base Spots</>
- If it takes a chair, bag, hook, pelagornis, ovis or any other tricks to enter your base — it's illegal. Red-gunned instantly.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 7</> - <TextStyle.White>No Open World Turrets</>
- Turrets in the open world without context are not allowed. Temporary fobs, bat turrets or taming setups must be packed up promptly.
(e.g. for teleporters/raiding/taming/osd drops/element vein/active PvP)
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 8</> - <TextStyle.White> Blockages</>
- No blocking cave entrances, surface entries (like on Aberration), or trapping players in bases/caves with no exit unless actively raiding.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 9</> - <TextStyle.White> # of Base Locations</>
- Each tribe is allowed a maximum of 2 bases per map, with a strict limit of 1 Major Cave or Custom Cave per tribe on that map 
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 10</> - <TextStyle.White> No Tesla Coils internally</>
-Tesla Coils are banned from use Inside and are only for use from the entrance of your base and beyond, Just because you can place it in some caves and ratholes doesn't mean you are allowed to.

<TextStyle.Red>Punishments</>
<TextStyle.White>1st Offence: Warning & tribe logged/Instant Red Gun</>
<TextStyle.White>2nd Offence: 1-week ban</>
<TextStyle.White>3rd Offence: Season ban</>
Admin discretion applies.

content.title: <TextStyle.Red>Tribe Rules</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 1</> - <TextStyle.White>4-Man Tribe Limit</>
- No allies, no exceptions. Same 4-man roster across all maps.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 2</> - <TextStyle.White>No Teaming</>
- Raiding, PvP, or defending with another tribe = illegal. Trading and avoiding conflict is okay.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 3</> - <TextStyle.White>No Insiding / Reverse Insiding</>
- Tribe owners control the tribe. Leaving? Only take what’s given. Being kicked? Owners should fairly compensate.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 4</> - <TextStyle.White>Report Your Tribe</>
- If someone in your tribe breaks the rules, report it. Innocent members who don’t participate can receive immunity — but not if you stood by and let it happen
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 5</> - <TextStyle.White>No Scamming</>
- Be fair and honest in trades. If you scam, you’re banned.
<TextStyle.Red>Rule 6</> - <TextStyle.White>Name Consistency</>
- We have no problems with a tribe changing their name, it must be consistent across all maps however. If you become Goofy Goobers on Island then EXT must also be updated to match.

<TextStyle.Red>Punishments:</>
<TextStyle.White>1st Offence: Warning & Tribe logged</>
<TextStyle.White>2nd Offence: 1-week ban</>
<TextStyle.White>3rd Offence: Season ban</>
Admin discretion applies.

content.title: <TextStyle.White>White</>, <TextStyle.Green>Green</>, <TextStyle.Blue>Blue</> & <TextStyle.Violet>Purple</> Drops
content.text:
<TextStyle.White>White Drops:</>
- Starter Flak & Tools
<TextStyle.Orange>Bonus</> <TextStyle.White>White</> <TextStyle.Orange>Drops:</>
- Starter Flak & Tools, Small BP Chance

<TextStyle.Green>Green Drops:</>
- Starter Taming Kit + Basic Taming Food
<TextStyle.Orange>Bonus</> <TextStyle.Green>Green</> <TextStyle.Orange>Drops:</>
- Better Food + Small BP Chance

<TextStyle.Blue>Blue Drops:</>
- Building supplies
<TextStyle.Orange>Bonus</> <TextStyle.Blue>Blue</> <TextStyle.Orange>Drops:</>
- Advanced building pieces and small Auto Turret chance

<TextStyle.Violet>Purple Drops:</>
- Boss Artifacts, Tributes & Chibis
<TextStyle.Orange>Bonus</> <TextStyle.Violet>Purple</> <TextStyle.Orange>Drops:</>
- 1 of Every Boss Artifact + Tribute needed for this maps boss

content.title: <TextStyle.Yellow>Yellow</> & <TextStyle.Red>Red</> Drops
content.text:
<TextStyle.Yellow>Yellow Drops:</>
Hardback Saddles & Saddle BPs
<TextStyle.Orange>Bonus</> <TextStyle.Yellow>Yellow</> <TextStyle.Orange>Drops:</>
Less Hardback Saddles & More Saddle BPs

<TextStyle.Red>Red Drops:</>
Saddle & PvP BPs
<TextStyle.Orange>Bonus</> <TextStyle.Red>Red</> <TextStyle.Orange>Drops:</>
up to a Double Drop worth of Blueprints

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>BOSS</> Drops
content.text:
Bosses in TGP Drop their normal element & will also drop 2 - 3 Blueprints Per Boss. These blueprints are one of the best ways to gear farm in TGP other than the Bonus Red & Yellow Skydrops & Cave Drops. 

Bossfights are simple to farm and prepare for considering that that purple drops give you the artifacts so you shouldnt have to much trouble getting ready!

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>Mod List</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.Yellow>CybersPullit!</>
This mod provides 3 buttons above your inventory and containers allowing the wireless transfer of resources!

<TextStyle.Yellow>Element And Tribute Transfers</>
These should be automatically enabled and simply work like any other normal item

<TextStyle.Yellow>Helena Bot Companion</>
This mod not only locks the Admin Privelages behind a wall only accessable by the people the owner marks as GameMasters. It also allows players to link their account via the discord and access tribe logs directly from discord and houses your Mailbox

<TextStyle.Yellow>Resonant's Shop Mod</>
You can earn points passively over time or by PvP (Player Vs Player) killing someone you can steal 5% of their total balance. To access the store hold the Interact Button (Square on PS, X on Xbox or R on PC) From there you may make purchases and trade points with others. You can also link to our discord and use the coin packs at the top of the store to transfer into free discord currency without the need for an admin!

<TextStyle.Yellow>Solo Farm Mod</>
This mod allows you to enable autofarm mod on dinos as well as allows you to set what resources they are allowed to farm via the Solo Farm Mod Remote (Engram you can Learn)

<TextStyle.Yellow>Pelayori's Cryo Storage</>
Pelyoris have a CryoGun that requires you to use the Cryo Chambers to get it to work. You can Cryo a dino from a far as well as read more information about your dinos among other things

<TextStyle.Yellow>Utilities Plus</>
This mod brings Re-Useable variants of the different items in the game. For example: Grapple Hooks, Parachuts, Flare Guns among others

<TextStyle.Yellow>Arkomatic</>
This Mod brings a hoarde of new items that allow automatic crafting among many other great features.

content.title: <TextStyle.Orange>Important Notes</>
content.text:
<TextStyle.White>Server Cross Chat</>
Our community features Cross Cluster Chat allowing the ability to talk to the community across servers with ease bringing the community closer

<TextStyle.Green>Transfering Points</>
We will allow you to transfer points to the Discord Janet Shop Bot. You will need to link your EOS ID to the discord before consuming a coin from the ingame store

<TextStyle.Blue>ORP</>
- This device does not provide complete immunity, It is acquired via Ticket and registering to the tribe logs in discord. 
- When you log off a 30 minute timer begins, Once it is completed your turrets damage & structure resistance increases to 2x 

<TextStyle.Red>Admins</>
- Admins will not force join you to tribes. The cooldown timer exists for a reason.
- Admins are not responsible for items lost due to server resets, Wildcard bugs, getting Arked or disconnections. So try to always log out in a safe place!
- We are always here to support our community. The absolute best place to reach out to us is via the discord and submitting a ticket.


<TextStyle.Orange>Evidence</>
We require evidence for most things. If you experience an issue or notice something causeing you trouble,<TextStyle.Red>PLEASE CLIP EVERYTHING</> if you cannot directly prove the accusation and an admin cannot find any evidence, we may not be able to do anything to assist!
